sub_title: Leader of corporate innovation.  Commercialisation of professional services, customer success, digital technologies and GTM solutions.
summary:
Innovator and inspirational leader with diverse global industry and client experience in commercialising professional services, customer success experiences, digital technologies, and SaaS GTM solutions.

Professional Services Solutions Innovation & Delivery *   Customer Success & Experience  * Business Operations Optimization
Marketing: Products, Solutions, Services  *  Customer Success & Sales Enablement Programs
P&L Ownership To €13B+  *   Teams 120+   *   Global Oversight
	
•	Passionate about technology and creating business value through building customer-focused solutions & GTM strategies for customer value optimization.
•	Equally strong orientations in operational excellence, team leadership, and client management.
•	Led major market entry projects, profitability and operational efficiency improvements in Fortune 100 companies and start-ups. 
•	Proven track record of transforming underperforming businesses into successful, stable producers:  
•	Generated new revenue streams of €35M and €40M through corporate intrapreneurship. Realised new products, processes and business models.
•	Grew profit through better resource utilisation, controlling contract delivery, and cost reductions up to €2M.
•	Consistently outperformed metric targets for: license renewals, service sales attach rates, margins, upsell services sales and revenues, and customer satisfaction scores.

school.name: The University of Texas at Austin

certifications.name: Languages:  English - native, Spanish - fluent intermediate, Dutch - beginner
Salesforce Marketing Cloud Certified Marketing Cloud Email Specialist

projects.title: Project – New technology innovation
projects.description: As an innovator and inspirational leader for over 25 years with diverse global industry and client experience, I’ve devoted my career to leveraging emerging technologies in order to introduce next-generation customer experiences and drive substantial business.  Advocating customer solutions and services, my efforts focus on revealing a company’s unique success story in their ability to deliver value and solve problems – and do it profitably.

contributors.headline: Leader of corporate innovation.  Commercialisation of professional services, customer success, digital technologies and GTM solutions.

projects.title: Project – Professional services management
projects.description:
I have developed a unique approach to the ‘business management of professional services’ and solution marketing.  It enables a holistic, scalable, and maintainable solution which has been proven repeatedly to drive higher sales, increase customer satisfaction, and support long-term customer success initiatives for companies and their customers.

SAMPLE RESULTS:

TRANSFORMING ORGANIZATIONS, PRODUCTS, MARKETING AND PROFESSIONAL SERVICES
Respected as a strategic visionary, I’ve grown service organisations, optimised operations, and turned entrepreneurial ventures into successful, reliable producers.
► Steering the reconstruction of a $20m mid-market consulting firm, I revamped the business model to build a high-impact professional services organisation, capable of serving global enterprises.

OPTIMIZING PROFITS & CLIENT SATISFACTION
Throughout my career, I have significantly improved license renewals, service sales attach rates, margins, upsell services sales/revenues, and customer satisfaction scores.
► In just 6 months I saved 200%+ in project costs, increased billability 65%+, and boosted margins 100%+. More than 98% of all projects were completed on-time and within budget.

DRIVING RECORD-BREAKING SALES INCREASES
As an influential strategist, trusted mentor, and senior advisor, I offer a verifiable track record of leading professional services to set and exceed ambitious performance goals.
► For Adobe Systems, I improved billability 90%, boosted customer satisfaction 75%, and increased SaaS/Service consulting sales YOY 32%.

contributors.headline: Leader of corporate innovation.  Commercialisation of professional services, customer success, digital technologies and GTM solutions.

profile_positions.description:
Provide strategy consulting and leadership for enterprise, start-up and spin-out clients. Focus on go-to-market programs, professional services development, customer success strategy & customer experience design, and operational growth strategies to drive customer success, sales solutions and ROI. 

Sample long-term client engagements:
profile_positions.title: Executive Consultant / Interim Director / Business Owner

profile_positions.description:
SERVICENOW (a SaaS digital workflow platform)

Served as Regional Director for the West Coast within the Value Management department. Expanded the team’s ability to support sales efforts through the creation of scalable tools for value measurement and calculation. Revised and executed programs for individual customer engagements to identify, quantify and articulate business value propositions of ServiceNow SaaS implementation and digital transformation projects. 
•	Grew team by 50% to better support sales and account management. 
•	Developed sales team from 15% competent in value analysis to 80%. Increased sales conversion rate beyond target.


INTEL (a technology company)

Consulted on Intel’s entry into a new artificial intelligence market space. Initiated sales enablement programs, marketing, and scalable project delivery management systems. 
•	Improved sales attachment Q/Q18% through productizing services offerings and delivery methodology.
•	Drove customer satisfaction scores and SaaS license renewal 13% in 6 months through newly deployed program of customer solutions, services packages, GTM sales/marketing collateral, and re-architected operational metrics.
profile_positions.title: PS-Ology: Sample long term CLIENT Engagements

profile_positions.description:
PIERRY INC  
(a Wunderman / WPP company and a Salesforce GSI Partner providing SFDC technology services)

Led reconstruction of $20M mid-market consulting firm for an acquisition sale.  Renovated into a profitable enterprise-level services, solutions-driven, scalable organization. Designed the business growth strategy to create integrated customer experiences.  Efforts included organization talent increases, revised operational delivery methodology, and go-to-market sales enablement programs.  
Oversaw client engagements, consulting services delivery, staffing/training, customer success and account management programs, product offerings, and metrics/reporting.  Led high-performance team of 70+ consultants; 300+ ongoing projects. 
•	Realized project cost savings of >200% in 6 months. Saved >100% in investment consulting hours, reducing contract execution time 88% and delivery time by >50% for optimized profit margins.
•	Increased billability improvement over >65% (to 87% avg billability) and margins >100% in 6 months, with 98% projects completed on-time, on-budget.  
•	Key contributor to a $75M company acquisition through leading re-structuring initiatives.
profile_positions.title: PS-Ology:  Sample long term CLIENT Engagements 2

profile_positions.description:
As an Adobe leader, owned global business performance of Adobe Marketing Cloud (SaaS) Social Mmarketing platform.   Efforts included professional services consultant business, delivery and enablement programs; product solutions marketing and GTM packages.  Supported customers by driving Marketing Cloud implementations and usage to meet their business/technology goals. Shaped new team into an enterprise-level services organization in <18 months. 120+ staff; $20M OPEX budget; owned global application professional services sales quota and revenue goals.
•	Introduced enablement programs and delivery methodology that fostered operational excellence and “customer-first” positioning. 
•	Increased consultant team billability by 90% and customer satisfaction rating by 75%. 
•	Accelerated global resource billability 260% and utilization 23% via cross-training and new resource allocation.
•	Improved resource allocations and delivery 180% by creating scalable, packaged service solution offerings 
enabling faster software implementations and customer adoption.
•	Optimized product renewal sales YOY 32% and increased service sales attach rate 70%.
profile_positions.title: Director, Global Professional Services & Customer Marketing Solutions, Adobe Marketing Cloud

profile_positions.description:
Led Fortune 100 clients in digital transformations. Executed strategic marketing service solutions and technology enablements for omni-channel integrations, ecommerce and mobile applications, and digital advertising. Created client business value through quality experiences and innovations utilizing AI, IOT, and CRM technologies and tools to align marketing and business needs.    
Managed 150+ onshore/offshore teams. Oversaw $18M OPEX budget.  Responsible for revenue and margin performance. 
Sample clients included: Intuit, Sony, MillerCoors (21 brands), Whirlpool brands, General Motors.
•	Accelerated agency production capacity by 65% while maintaining staff operating budget growth levels.  Accomplished by revising production processes, redefining staffing methodology, and project allocations.
•	Outperformed production forecast expectations by 20% while managing $3M–$30M US client contracts with YOY growth.
•	Example Client impact: optimized global YOY ecommerce sales 35% while reducing website OPEX 40%.
profile_positions.title: Vice President of Digital Technology, Consulting & Enablement

profile_positions.description:
Co-led the creation of a white label SaaS product supply and ecommerce platform to increase business and global growth. Utilized forward-thinking digital technologies, business strategies, and operational processes to release industry-leading platform for B2C, B2B, and suppliers.  Became the GM leader of the $35M white label product and media business initiated on the platform.  Repositioned business from a competitive player to industry market leader through incorporating a solutions-selling strategic partnership model.  Held responsibility for sales and revenue target performance.  Key clients included: American Airlines, Hertz, Capital One, Hilton, Microsoft.

•	Generated >49% sales increase and 19% profitability increase within 18 months. 
•	Captured a new $10B market segment through SaaS platform launch
•	Reduced costs ~60%, saving 30% OPEX. Streamlined time and resources, unearthing $150M market in US and EMEA by leveraging front-running web service product strategy and market positioning with white label client advertising.
•	Increased account retention 15% and Partner account profitability 11%–59% YOY.
profile_positions.title: Vice President of Strategic Distribution & White Label Ecommerce Solutions

profile_positions.description:
Held various positions throughout long term tenure.    

Initiated Dell’s entry into the online and ecommerce channels.   Promoted into increasingly challenging roles based on performance record; fuelling sales, customer engagement, and operational savings through leveraging new technologies and customer opportunities. 

•	Technology evangelist — pioneering efforts for online sales channel—for adoption of ecommerce, digital marketing, customer service, order management, and best practices consulting. 
•	Influenced and negotiated with international business and product unit managers to expand digital footprint; documented business processes to align integration of new online external order system with legacy order management / ERP systems 
•	Generated >$40M sales and saved $1M OPEX in 12 months from managing and launching APAC/Japan ecommerce websites
profile_positions.title: Sr. E-Business Development  – Global Programme Mgr / E-Business Strategist
